content: I think that's a great plan! I'll definitely try to incorporate some of these exercises into my strength and conditioning routine. I'll start with lower body strength exercises like squats and lunges, and then move on to core strength exercises like planks and Russian twists. I'll also try to incorporate plyometric exercises like box jumps and depth jumps to improve my explosiveness. And finally, I'll make sure to prioritize functional strength exercises that mimic tennis movements.
